com.sitewhere.spi.asset

Interface IAssetModuleManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILifecycleComponent, ITenantLifecycleComponent

    public interface IAssetModuleManager
extends ITenantLifecycleComponent
    Interface for interacting with the asset module manager.
